rules.text: Adopt a step-by-step approach to memorization by combining imagery and repetition.
Establish time limits for digital engagement to recalibrate attention.
Reinforce foundational skills through consistent practice over time.

warnings.text: Over-reliance on digital platforms may fragment attention and limit deep engagement.
Success requires sustained commitment to disciplined practice rather than sporadic efforts.

claims.text: Structured visualization strengthens cognitive abilities by leveraging familiar mental frameworks.
Temporary disconnection from digital tools recalibrates focus and enhances productivity.

principles.text: Use structured visualization techniques to enhance memory retention.
Break down complex tasks into manageable steps for effective execution.
Set clear boundaries to manage distractions and improve focus.
